author: The Irish Times
title: Africans reportedly discriminated against in China in Covid-19 scare
description: Ambassadors express concerns over claims of eviction and forced testing
content:
African ambassadors in China have written to the countrys foreign minister over what they call discrimination against Africans as the country seeks to prevent a resurgence of coronavirus.
Several African countries have separately also demanded that China add… [+2940 chars]
